page.title: 18PLAYGROUND GAME
page.content: 'ONE HAD,ALL HAD' You can play this game nearly anywhere.You need two places for 'homes' and about 6 people.Then you decide who will be 'on it'(they catch people).Then all the people who are not 'on it' go to a 'home'.Next everyone else tries to go back and forth.When you get 'had'(caught),you have to help the person who has caught you.When everyone has been 'had',the process begins again with the 'had' person,who was first 'on it'.There are different rules;you can make chains by holding hands and stretching from 'home'.You can have countdowns;when you are in the 'home' for a long time, the person 'on it' counts down from 1O to O and if you are not out before O,you help catch others.
